name: OCKInstructionsTaskView
desc: A view that displays a header, multi-line label, and a completion button.

items.name: let contentStackView: OCKStackView
items.desc: A vertical stack view that holds the main content for the view.

items.name: let headerView: OCKHeaderView
items.desc: A header view that shows a separator and an image at the end of the view.

items.name: let instructionsLabel: OCKLabel
items.desc: A multi-line label below the header view.

items.name: let completionButton: OCKLabeledButton
items.desc: The button on the bottom of the view.

items.name: var delegate: OCKTaskViewDelegate?
items.desc: The object that handles events related to changes in the event view.
